cards.title: Event Format
cards.content:
5 Days of Preparation → 1 War Day → 1 Settlement Day
Prep Phase determines which server invades, but War Day determines the true winner.

cards.title: Victory Conditions
cards.content: Winning the throne battle on War Day secures full KvK victory, regardless of Prep Phase performance.

cards.title: Lead-up Days
cards.content:
• Day -2: KvK Announcement (Appears in Event Panel)
• Day -1: Server Matchmaking (Enemy server revealed)
• Alliance Strategy Discussions begin here.

cards.title: Server Score
cards.content: During Days 1–5, all activity contributes to your server’s score. The server with more total points at the end of Day 5 becomes the Invading Kingdom.

cards.title: Map Mechanics
cards.content: On War Day, portals will open to invade or defend. The Invading server must breach gates and capture the throne to win KvK.

cards.title: Throne Battle
cards.content: Multiple Towers surround the Throne. Your guild must occupy the Throne for a full countdown to claim victory.

tabs.title: Construction
tabs.description: Focus on upgrading your base structures to earn points. The higher the level, the better the score.
tips: Prioritize Command Center, Training Grounds, and Research Lab.
Use Construction Speedups efficiently—chain builds with timers.
Avoid using instant finish unless you have spare speedups.
Queue multiple upgrades the night before reset.

tabs.title: Research
tabs.description: Complete tech upgrades in your Research Lab to earn points.
tips: Prioritize high-point techs (Military > Economy > Growth).
Use Research Speedups or General Speedups.
Begin long techs before reset to complete during event.
Watch for research buffs in the Alliance Tech.

tabs.title: Rally
tabs.description: Run alliance rallies, defeat world bosses, and upgrade Lord Gear.
tips: Use every Rally Ticket (they recharge hourly).
Coordinate with alliance for constant rallies—especially active zones.
Upgrade Lord Gear before reset to maximize points.
Use challenge bosses as bonus score farming.

tabs.title: Hero
tabs.description: Enhance your top heroes to score. Levels, skills, stars, and gear all count.
tips: Save EXP items and Fragments for this day.
Enhance gear on heroes actively used in Arena or Rally.
Skill upgrades and star ascensions grant bonus points.
Focus on SSR+ or SSS+ heroes for higher point yields.

tabs.title: Training
tabs.description: Train new troops across all tiers—higher tiers score more.
tips: Train T4 troops if possible (highest points per unit).
Use training boosts from Alliance Tech or Guild Buffs.
Start training queues the night before and speed finish post-reset.
Don’t forget to claim troop training event rewards too.

tabs.title: War
tabs.description: Portals open! Invade or defend your throne zone. PvP begins.
tips: Reinforce allied towers and guildmates under attack.
Use healing speedups generously—points are lost when wounded.
Capture towers near the Throne to prevent enemy movement.
Group attack key buildings—Throne, Gates, and Barracks.
Avoid solo porting; move in packs with support.

tabs.title: Settlement
tabs.description: Healing, assisting, and post-war cleanup. Green potions boost alliance healing.
tips: Use all remaining healing potions to assist alliance mates.
Finish wounded troops before server reset for ranking.
Thank active guildies and discuss War Day reflections.
Start preparing for the next event cycle (clear queues, stock up).

cards.title: 💰 Resource Management
cards.content:
Preload long timers
Stock up on speedups & buffs before KvK.

cards.title: 🤝 Team Coordination
cards.content:
Use Discord or Guild chat to schedule rallies.
Assign targets before War Day.

cards.title: 🛡️ Defense & Offense
cards.content:
Place backup armies in shielded bases.
Take Towers early on War Day.
